item.title: Cubase64
item.description: This is nuts, some guy wrote an awesome sound editor for the Commodore 64, Cubase64! Link comes via man like Tack

item.title: You Can Be A Kernel Hacker
item.description: Brilliant, brilliant talk from Julia Evans, getting excited about kernel hacking. Warning: Super infectious levels of enthusiasm!
